She walked around the inside of the ship.  She sighed and felt her 
temper rising.  She went outside through the ripped out back half of 
the ship.  She looked around at the forest that she had crashed in.  
She heard a noise in the forest, coming towards her.  She transformed 
into fire lizard.  She stood only 6 feet tall, wing span of 15 feet.  
Plasma fire breath and lazars in the optics.  Her skin was a shiney 
emerald green.  The horns on her head gave her a crowned look.  She 
looked around at what was coming her way.  It was a strange looking 
animal that broke through the woods. She saw a small brown animal, 
with two floppy antennas sticking out of it's head. A small ball of 
fluff at one end, and a twitchy nose on the front side. It jumped and 
hopped around the bottom of the forest. It stopped, looked at her, 
then disappeared under the bushes. 

She sighed and lowered her dragon head. "Well, perhaps I'll find life 
forms that aren't so afraid of me."  She went back inside the ship, 
and layed down in fire lizard form.  Her head rested on her paws.  
She glanced up towards the sky and hoped she would see something that 
would mean there was life out there. However, with her energy levels 
spent, she fell asleep.
